\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	A & B & {(B,X_i)} & {(A,X_i)} \\
	{X_i} & {Y_i} & {(B,Y_i)} & {(A,Y_i)}
	\arrow["g", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, dashed, from=1-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{(g,X_i)}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["1"', shift right, draw=none, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{(B,f_i)}"', hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(A,f_I)}", hook, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["2"', draw=none, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{f_i}", hook, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{(g,Y_i)}"', from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["3", draw=none, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
